issue.title: Split integration test between duration and interval
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some implementations support durations, just not intervals
